theorem.name: app_inductive_clause

text.english:
Inductive clause of the definition of \(\texttt{app}\):

\[ \forall l_1,l_2 \in L_A .\; \forall a \in A .\; \texttt{app}(a :: l_1, l_2) = a :: \texttt{app} (l_1, l_2) \]
text.italiano:
Clausola induttiva della definizione di \(\texttt{app}\):

\[ \forall l_1,l_2 \in L_A .\; \forall a \in A .\; \texttt{app}(a :: l_1, l_2) = a :: \texttt{app} (l_1, l_2) \]

theorem.coq:
Theorem app_inductive_clause : forall (l1 : listn) (l2 : listn) (a : nat) , app (a :: l1) l2 = a :: app l1 l2.
Proof.
Admitted.
